'''Rhythm Tengoku''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to stop an [[Abyss Mage]] from regenerating its shield.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to the Japanese rhythm game {{w|Rhythm Tengoku}} published by {{w|Nintendo}}.
